caption.center: Gary NASH and Larry Washington v. STATE of Mississippi.

Jack G. Price, McComb, Bruce A. Thompson, Pitkin, LA, for appellants.

opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
FRAISER, C.J., COLEMAN and THOMAS, P.JJ., BARBER, KING, PAYNE and SOUTHWICK, JJ., concur.
